meanings.sent1: The unthreaded screw wouldn't stay in place.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to sew with the unthreaded needle.
meanings.sent3: The unthreaded shoelace caused a comical trip.
meanings.sent5: The unthreaded rope was useless for tying knots.

meanings.sent2: The unthreaded bolt couldn't be screwed in.
meanings.sent3: The unthreaded hose sprayed water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her unthreaded hair tie snapped when stretched.
meanings.sent5: The unthreaded sweater unraveled in the wash.
